name: sup3rS3cretMes5age
description: sup3rS3cretMes5age is a self-hosted tool to create secret, expiring links to messages. It encrypts content and only decrypts client-side when the link is opened.
features: Secret messages: Creates one-time links to encrypted messages that self-destruct.
Client-side encryption: Encrypts messages in browser before sending to server.
One-time access: Destroys messages after first viewing for security.
Time expiration: Sets automatic expiration for messages after specified duration.
Password protection: Optionally requires password to decrypt and view messages.
No registration: Creates secret messages without accounts or authentication.
Burn notification: Optionally notifies sender when message is read.
Custom expiration: Chooses from preset durations or sets custom expiration time.
Simple interface: Creates and shares secret links with minimal steps.
Mobile friendly: Works on smartphones for secure message sharing on the go.
No server storage: Server never stores decryption keys or message content.
Open source: Auditable code ensures security and privacy claims.
